title: Polki and Emerald Antique Finish Haaram - Timeless Elegance
features: This exquisite haaram features a symmetrical design of Polki diamonds interspersed with round emeralds. The center pendant is a stunning pear-shaped emerald, surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds. Each diamond is meticulously set in a closed setting, reflecting traditional craftsmanship. The antique Hyderabadi polish gives it a vintage, heirloom appearance.
colors: Predominantly gold with the vibrant green of the emeralds and the soft white of the Polki diamonds.
occasions: or any grand occasion where you want to make a statement. Suitable for both traditional and modern attire.
description: This haaram is a masterpiece of traditional South Indian jewelry design, combined with modern sensibility. The use of Polki diamonds gives it a unique, unmatched brilliance, while the emeralds provide a touch of regal elegance. The antique Hyderabadi polish enhances its heirloom quality, making it a piece to be treasured for generations. Its intricate craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty.
